name: Butter Cake
author: Sara Snider
instructions: Preheat oven 325Â°. Grease & flour 10 inch tube pan. Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda & salt. Set aside In lange bowl mix l c. butter & 1 1/2c. white sugar & 1/2 c. brown sugar until light & fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time. Stir in the vanilla. Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the Sour Cream, mixing just until incorpraty. Pour batter into prepared pan - Bake for 75 min or until toothpick inserted in center is clean. Remove from oven & prick cake all over w/ a wooden pick 20-30 times. Pour butter sauce on cake once allowed to completely cool as cake is very fragile when warm. Run knife around edges & invert onto serving dish - dust w/ powdered sugar. FOR BUTTER SAUCE - go to Recipe 885 'Butter Cake Butter Sauce'
